text: Rigas Feraios (, ) is a municipality in the Magnesia regional unit, Thessaly, Greece. The seat of the municipality is the town Velestino.Kallikratis law Greece Ministry of Interior The municipality has an area of . The municipality was named after the Greek writer and revolutionary Rigas Feraios, whose hometown was Velestino. ==Municipality== The municipality Rigas Feraios was formed at the 2011 local government reform by the merger of the following 3 former municipalities, that became municipal units: *Feres *Karla *Keramidi ==References== Category:Municipalities of Thessaly Category:Populated places in Magnesia (regional unit)
title: Rigas Feraios (municipality)
